dcterms:creator: C. Hedges
F. Perry
dcterms:description: The USDOT J2735 MAP tool allows users to create MAP and Signal Phase and Timing (SPaT) messages with free access, providing a web application user interface that uses satellite imagery to enable users to manually select and map lanes and features.
dcterms:title: USDOT J2735 MAP tool

dcterms:creator: P. Teunissen
O. Montenbruck
dcterms:description: The GNSS Real-time Kinematic Positioning (RTK) survey provides high-accuracy positioning data using a dual-frequency receiver and corrections from a base station.
dcterms:title: GNSS Real-time Kinematic Positioning (RTK) survey

dcterms:creator: W. Hu
A. Neupane
J. A. Farrell
dcterms:description: The Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) survey provides positioning data for assessing the accuracy of the USDOT map tool by comparing feature locations determined by GNSS.
dcterms:title: Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) survey

dcterms:creator: J. Jiao
dcterms:description: The ESRI manual for georeferencing provides guidelines for constructing georeferences using multiple points to ensure accuracy in mapping.
dcterms:title: ESRI manual for georeferencing

dcterms:creator: H. Topan
H. S. Kutoglu
dcterms:description: This dataset includes various feature points used for assessing georeferencing accuracy of high-resolution satellite images.
dcterms:title: Various feature points (N1 = 39 and N2 = 55)
